about_the_game:
This is the demo for "Falling for Yaoguais", featuring nearly 50,000 words of text and 28 choices.

Please note that the content in the demo is not the final version.

"Falling for Yaoguais" is a fantasy visual novel based on Taiwanese yaoguai(supernatural beings) legends.

You are drawn into a conflict between humans and yaoguais, navigating through events alongside four yaoguai love interests. Who will you end up with in the end?

What if the legendary yaoguais(supernatural beings) were real?

And even more shocking... they're all hot guys!

 

You (custom name) apply for a seemingly ordinary job at an amusement park, only to discover it's a trap set by yaoguais to lure humans as food! Worse yet, you must disguise yourself as one of them and secretly investigate the conspiracy behind it all.

The revered Sacred White Chiedong Tree Deity, the cold and sharp-tongued Serpent Prince, the fearsome Specter Jin who demands live sacrifices, and the mischievous Mischief Elf who tricks people into the mountains—face amusement park crises with these four as you make over 150 choices, forming bonds that run deep or stay shallow.

As the truth unravels, an even bigger plot awaits.

——But hey, love comes first, right?

The amusement park's manager who offers you a high reward to disguise yourself as a yaoguai and assist in the investigation.

In truth, he is a thousand-year-old ancient tree, transformed into a powerful guardian deity through human faith. Though he appears stern, he's actually quite soft-hearted, and you can sense his unintentional kindness.

Protecting humans is in Bai Ruomu’s nature, but this pure-hearted guardian slowly begins to realize that his feelings for you might go beyond mere protection...

A scientist who occupies the amusement park's infirmary and, upon discovering you're human, views you as a rare test subject.

As the descendant of a serpent god and a human woman, he wields great power.

Arrogant and sharp-tongued, Mo Daan has a purely scientific mind—yet he's stuck with a love-obsessed father who insists he find a human woman to truly love.

To make matters worse, his father gave him a Love Blossom that will only bloom when he meets "the one." What a headache!

You notice everyone piling their work on him and can’t help but step in—only to discover he’s not just a supervisor but the amusement park’s most capable employee, handling everything on his own!

Specter Jin is an ancient yaoguai with a long history of close ties to humans. In the past, humans would sacrifice lives to him in exchange for his labor.

Though gentle by nature, he’s long been aware that you’re human but chooses not to reveal it.

Who would have thought that this once fearsome, man-eating Specter Jin would now be so fond of acting cute?

Superstar Yan Xingmang isn’t just an amusement park employee—he’s also a yaoguai?!

In fact, he’s the notorious trickster, the mischievous Mischief Elf, known for luring people into the mountains.
Cheerful and curious about humans, he finds it fascinating that you, a ‘yaoguai,’ are so familiar with human life.
He frequently flirts with you, making you wonder—does he say this to every girl?

Thrown into the world of yaoguai, you barely escape being eaten and must now disguise yourself as one of them, navigating the complex relationships with other yaoguais.

Though scared at first, your strong mental fortitude helps you quickly bond with them, even becoming friends.

You're a bit reckless, but never weak—running away is never an option in your choices.
The yaoguais don’t understand love, but as you find yourself entangled with four yaoguai love interests, the question is—do you? The choice is yours.

  • A fantasy story based on Taiwanese yaoguai legends

  • Over 300,000 words with more than 150 choices, offering rich, immersive storytelling

  • Customizable heroine name

  • Four unique love interests, all inspired by Taiwanese yaoguai

  • At least nine Taiwanese yaoguai supporting characters

  • Five endings (four exclusive to each love interest, one bad ending)

  • And most importantly, you can romance all four love interests at once—be bold in your pursuit of love!

Producer: Juice

Writer: Sixty-Seven

Character Design/Sprites: Orange Go

CG：Meron Fly

SD：HNLamb Studio

Trailer：UGLY

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains text-based depictions of mild sexual references.
